definitions.definition: A flowering plant of the genus Hibiscus , especially Hibiscus syriacus , found in tropical to temperate regions, of some species used for making infusions /tea.
A cocktail made with champagne and cranberry juice .

main_definition: A flowering plant of the genus Hibiscus , especially Hibiscus syriacus , found in tropical to temperate regions, of some species used for making infusions /tea.
secondary_definitions: A cocktail made with champagne and cranberry juice .
